CONTACT.HEADING: Contact Information
CONTACT.MESSAGE: Any fields left blank will not be displayed.

PERSONALISATION.HEADING: Personalisation
PERSONALISATION.MESSAGE: Add your own personalised message and picture to increase the chance of someone returning your belongings.

ERRORS.ATLEAST_ONE: At least one of the following fields must be filled in.

QR.HEADING: Your Qr Code
QR.MESSAGE: Your QR code remains the same even if you go on to change information at a later date.

TAGS.HEADING: Your Latest Tags
TAGS.MESSAGE: See the latest scans for your devices.

PREVIEW.HEADING: Your Information Preview
PREVIEW.MESSAGE: The information below is exactly what somebody will see when they scan your QR code, so make sure there's nothing on there that you wouldn't want a stranger to see.

LOGIN.HEADING: Sign in to your account

REGISTER.HEADING: Create an account
REGISTER.GO_TO_LOGIN_TEXT: Already have an account? Log in
